body: Abraham Lincoln's Legacy Lives  Explore Ford's Theatre NHS, discover Abraham Lincoln's life in Washington, D.C., the struggle for a united country, and the motivation behind Lincoln's assassination. The National Park Service and the Ford's Theatre Society present a variety of programs year round.                 Plan Your Visit   Get started here to help you plan your visit to Ford's Theatre and Petersen House.
